filterText

Methods  

filterText (ostr, txt)

output.t[653]

Apply the filter - this should be overridden in each filter. The return value is the result of filtering the string.

‘ostr’ is the OutputStream to which the text is being written, and ‘txt’ is the original text to be displayed. TADS 3 Library Manual
